title: Hero couple confronts Bondi Beach gunman in new unseen video | 9 News Australia
description: New dashcam vision reveals the heroic moment a couple confronted the Bondi Beach gunmen before being shot dead. title: "Under fire": Surf lifesavers' heroic actions during Bondi shooting | 9 News Australia
description: When gunmen opened fire at Bondi Beach, the local surf life savers and rescuers were the first to tend to victims. Now, their bravery is being honoured by Surf Life Saving New South Wales.  ----  A Bondi local who filmed the heroic lifeguard running barefoot to the beach as 15 innocent people were gunned down said she was stunned to witness an "extraordinary" moment of Australian spirit and bravery.
